content: Implement true Whirlpool sqrtPrice parsing from on-chain account data (no CoinGecko fallback)
Test execution engine in OBSERVE_ONLY mode with real market conditions
Fix WebSocket real-time updates for live UI
Fix status pill consistency across all UI screens (centralize state management)
Build Execution Monitor screen with dual-leg trade visualization
Build Inventory screen with CEX/DEX balance tracking
Build Risk & Limits screen with controls and kill switches
Root cause analysis: Investigate why spreads are only 0.07-0.23%
Deep testing: Edge cases (stale data, zero liquidity, API failures)
Performance testing: Latency and throughput under load
